name: stonks
description: A Google Apps Script webapp for managing investments, built with React and Parcel.
author: Akshay M <akshayknr7@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: npm run clean && cp -r src/backend/ ./src/appsscript.json ./dist && NODE_ENV=development parcel src/index.html --host 0.0.0.0 --dist-dir dist -p 8000
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && cp -r src/backend/* ./dist && cp ./src/dev-appsscript.json ./dist/appsscript.json && NODE_ENV=development parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir dist
scripts.build:beta: npm run clean && cp -r src/backend/* ./src/appsscript.json ./dist && NODE_ENV=beta parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir dist
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && cp -r src/backend/* ./src/appsscript.json ./dist && NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir dist
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run push:dev && clasp deploy --project=.beta-clasp.json -d dev/demo -i $DEV_DEPLOYMENT_ID
scripts.deploy:beta: npm run push:beta && clasp deploy --project=.beta-clasp.json -d beta -i $BETA_DEPLOYMENT_ID
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run push:prod && clasp deploy -d prod -i $PROD_DEPLOYMENT_ID
